sentences.sContent: She said something about leaving town.
sentences.sCn: 她说了些要离开镇子的话。

sentences.sContent: About that car of yours. How much are you selling it for?
sentences.sCn: 说到你的那辆车，你打算卖什么价钱？

sentences.sContent: What’s he on about (=  talking about  ) ?
It’s about Tommy, doctor. He’s been sick again.
Naturally, my mother wanted to know all about it (=  all the details relating to it  ) .
sentences.sCn: 很自然，我母亲想知道事情的全部。

sentences.sContent: ...and began to test her: he would give her a date and ask her to tell him about the world events on that day...
...and my wife spent the whole time worrying about bats getting into her hair...
...We were beginning to be adventurous about food...
...The team found that exercise reduced the speed of rapid eye movements by about 8%...
...It’s not about that; it’s about growth for me...
...but people still complain about their Internet being too slow...
...I could tell you everything about every day after that...
...Or to know more details about the laptop...
...we have choices about how we respond to it when it comes...
...But there were a lot of people around and I was a bit worried about the bees and the people stopping to look...

synos.tran: 在附近的；四处走动的；在起作用的

phrases.pCn: 处理；应付；就某事采取行动或措施
v. 着手做；四处走动；传开；从事

trans.tranOther: concerning or relating to a particular subject
